Topic.Title: Looking to hire a Squiffy writer/developer as freelancer

Posts.EditableText:
Hi guys. I'm looking to hire a Squiffy writer/developer (as a freelancer at the moment) to take a basic fantasy game plot I wrote, polish it and turn it into a Squiffy textadventure game. Nothing too complex, no fancy scripting required, and the "gamebook" isn't too long either. 

It might be a long-term gig and might open more possibilities of writing your own textadventures for me in the future.  

Please email me at

languagequesters (at) gmail (dot) com
